body:
Add a new feature, "whatprovides", that will show what package provides a desired file.

### Rationale

Suppose I would like to install some file (e.g. "make"), but there isn't a package with that name.
How would I know what package should I install in order to get that file?

### Description

This can be solved by a "whatprovides" feature, similar to one exists in "yum", or other package managers.


### Additional information
title: "whatprovides" feature - to find what package would provide a certain file
